Characters like Bristow is all that darts is missing in this day in age, noised everyone up and played world class darts at the same time. His life story is a superb watch. RIP The Crafty Cockney. https://t.co/6oAaMZaiyx

Don’t know what to make of the Lennon situation. If he is ill, I hope he gets better ASAP. Honestly, it reeks of massive shitbag and embarrassment to me though. Avoiding the players he criticised, the ones that gave everything since January. I’d be embarrassed an all 🇳🇬
Incredibly talented, such a sad ending. RIP. https://t.co/P5qYVSpuw4

@joshcannon93 Sounds more like he’s thrown his toys out the pram after getting beat (rightly beaten). It’s a bit sad really, he blamed he players after they had been 13 games unbeaten and he changed the formation, it was his fault for the result.
@ScotlandSky @CelticFC I make landing a 15 fold accumulator my main target every season and I’m still fuckin plotless.
I’ve absolutely no fuckin idea how Man Utd have managed to finish 2nd. Still absolutely dire to watch half the time. City will walk it again next season, barring a miracle.
@TomFoins @Poodingo Tim Sherwood’s not very impressed

@mckinnon410 Wasn’t great, but our lack of threat going forward was awful. It was a lot worse than previous games, games at Ibrox etc. Why change a formation that has been so successful with, a formation we have blown teams away with it. Flo and McLaren been great together. Mind boggling.

Unbeaten in 13 games until last night by playing two up top for the best part of it. Lennon changed that last night, bemused as to how that’s anyone’s fault but his own. He gambled, it failed, shoulder blame. Players have been superb since January, wrong to say anything less 💚
@seathsmark @The_Tman10 Great argument. Be gone, I’m done with you. https://t.co/JBUkziafeU

@seathsmark @The_Tman10 You tell yourself whatever you need to believe the slaver coming out your mouth. Not won a Old Firm in like 11 games, lost the last one 5-0 and should have been way worse, 13 point gap in the league and no hope in the cups. Your fuckin deluded.

@seathsmark @The_Tman10 Celtic have been a lot worse than last season due to not needing to flex their muscles. Didn’t really get out of second gear and it’s a 13 point gap. If they spend (which they don’t need to) the gap will increase again. Either way you’ll no challenge for the title.

@rmorrison1983 Hopefully he takes into context how much extra money he has compared to last season. Season ticket sales up as well, he’s managing a club on the up. Should be enough for him to want to stay. Time will tell. Personally delighted with the season. Fingers crossed for Europe 💚

@rmorrison1983 That’s all very well and good, but because they want to stay doesn’t mean we will get them. All put themselves in the shop window now and you have no idea who will go for them. Replacing McGinn and Dylan is the biggest problem. Possibly European tie in June. Not a lot of time.
@The_Tman10 Getting excited about piping little old newly promoted Hibs to third and still being light years behind Celtic. How the mighty have fallen.

He’s not went about it the right way, but I can understand Lennon’s frustration about the squad for next season. McGeough away on a free, McGinn probably away on a cut price. Allan, Kamberi, McLaren and Barker all leave after loan spells. Be a very different team next season.
@j_watt11 And still a very good chance of European football. Although I’ll no be counting my chickens..
@Poodingo Canny see it though
@Poodingo Correct mate. Be fuckin typical of Motherwell to go and win the Cup an all 😭
@Poodingo Would have been nice. Will take 4th and a possible Celtic Scottish Cup win for Europe. Painful the night though.
@Poodingo Ken mate, bit nervous now. You could close the gap to 14 on Sunday 😳

No two ways about it, that was pish. Didn’t deserve a thing from that. Chose the biggest game of the season to go missing. Celtic better win the Scottish Cup final to give me my much desired European trip.
Looking for McGinn tonight https://t.co/AbcQLdMeLf
Thompson has been horrendous for both sides, thank fuck he’s retiring. Useless cunt.
Has to be said, Hibs have bottled it so far. Big improvement needed. McGeough on will help and we are always better attacking our own fans at Tynie. 2-0 down springs to mind. We only need a point 🇳🇬
McGeough, ken the boy who was our player of the season, aye him, get him the fuck on at half time.
